cairo.c.config

This module contains information on what optional features are available with the used cairo library.

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_PNG_FUNCTIONS;
PNG functions are available

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_PS_SURFACE;
Postscript surface support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_PDF_SURFACE;
PDF surface support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_SVG_SURFACE;
SVG surface support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_WIN32_SURFACE;
Win32 surface support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_WIN32_FONT;
Win32 font support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_FT_FONT;
Freetype font support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_XCB_SURFACE;
XCB surface support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_DIRECTFB_SURFACE;
DirectFB surface support

enum bool CAIRO_HAS_XLIB_SURFACE;
XLIB surface support
